text: South Khorasan Province ( Ostān-e Khorāsān-e Jonūbī ) is a province in eastern Iran. Birjand is the centre of the province. Other major cities include Ferdows, Tabas and Qaen. == Related pages == * Khorasan * Razavi Khorasan Province * North Khorasan Province == Other websites == * The text of the law for division of Khorasan into three provinces (in Persian) * Cultural Heritage Foundation of Khorasan Category:Khorasan
title: South Khorasan province
